name: daily-memory
description: Create today's daily memory file at the start of each day
prompt:
Create today's daily memory file at memory/YYYY-MM-DD.md (use today's actual date).

Template:
```
# YYYY-MM-DD

## Tasks

## Notes

## Decisions

## Lessons
```

If the file already exists, don't overwrite it. Just confirm it exists.
